data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: site temperature data: Enderts (IENDXX)

This metadata record describes a mix of intertidal seawater and air temperature data collected at Enderts by PISCO. Measurements were collected using either Stowaway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp TPIC-05+37) or HOBO Pendant Temperature/Light Logger (Onset Computer Corp UA-002-64)

EARTH SCIENCE : Oceans : Ocean Temperature : Water Temperature|Temperature|Integrated Ocean Observing System|IOOS|Oceanographic Sensor Data|Intertidal Temperature Data|continental shelf|seawater|temperature|California|United States of America|PISCO
